name: A Mess Of Legs
description:
In A Mess Of Legs you and up to 7 others work together to control one spider. Working together climbing obstacles and moving platforms to reach the fly!

Notes:
This is a WIP build, so please let me know about any issues or bugs you encountered. Additionally, any and all feedback is great!

Controls:
(Xbox controller)

In Set Up Menu:

  • A - add controller
  • Left or Right Thumbstick Click - devide controller to share with a friend
  • Start and Back - Start Level
  • Left and Right Bumper - Cycle Player Colour

In Game:

  • Left or Right Trigger - Raise selected leg
  • Left or Right Thumbstick - move selected leg if it is raise
  • Left or Right Bumper - Cycle Selected Leg
  • Start and Back - Restart Level
  • (If controller is not split)
    • A - focus camera on target
    • Up and Down on the DPad - Adjust Camera Angle
  • (If controller is split)
    • Left, Right, X and B - Focus camera on Target
    • Up, Down, A, and Y - Adjust Camera Angle

(Keyboard)

  • Escape - return to level Select
  • Space - Start Level
